hu.akarnokd.reactive4java.reactive

Class DefaultConnectableObservable<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • hu.akarnokd.reactive4java.reactive.DefaultConnectableObservable<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - the element type to observe
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    ConnectableObservable<T>, Observable<T>

    public class DefaultConnectableObservable<T>
extends Object
implements ConnectableObservable<T>
    The default implementation for a connectable observable. This class can be used to make a cold observable (e.g., the one which computes when a registration occurs) into a hot observable (which is alive without any observers).
    Author:
    akarnokd, 2011.03.21.
